Interactive Concept Map

Musical notes distribution graphs

A Python Jupyter Notebook that takes a midi file and plots the distribution of musical notes by instrument.

About me

I'm Francesco Gentile,

A freelance software developer that enjoys music and reading and is always on the lookout for new experieces.

Some time ago I decided I wanted to stop just watching tutorials and begin to make stuff by myself. Now this is the place where I put all of those things together.

Contact

I'm most active here. I usually post stories of what books I'm reading or when I manage to fix a bug at 3AM. Event photos also go here.

I'm trying to use it a bit more to build a precence in the crypto-twitter space.

Project demos, stream recordings and old videos playing guitar and making animations. I might start vlogging or doing tutorials here.

I stream, sometimes. Coding and Rimworld.

Here lie all my projects, most them abandoned, but I'm proud of the few that are finished.
